name: Helm of the Dominator
description: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.

abilities.name: Dominate
abilities.description: Takes control of an enemy non-hero unit, elevating its status to a Creep-Hero, and granting it various stat bonuses.
notes: Cannot dominate Creep-heroes, Ancient units, Siege Creeps, Necronomicon Archer, or Necronomicon Warrior
Dominating a creep while already having one dominated instantly kills the previously dominated creep
Applies a basic dispel on the creep upon cast
Sets the unit's type to Creep-Hero
Sets base movement speed to 380, regardless of its default movement speed
If max health is below the min health threshold, sets current and max health to 1000
Sets gold bounty to 100, overwriting its default bounty
Increases base attack damage, it is not granted as an attack damage bonus
Increases health regen and mana regen
Grants an armor bonus, it is not added to the base armor
Does not restore the creep's mana
The number of max dominated units is bound to the wielder, and shared amongst multiple Helms of the Dominator and Helms of the Overlord
If the max gets exceeded, the oldest dominated creep is instantly killed; Its bounties are granted to the wielder

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant 132 health and 0.6 health regeneration
72 mana, 0.3 mana regeneration and 0.6% flat base magic resistance
6 main attack damage to all Strength/Agility/Intelligence heroes
8.1 main attack damage to universal heroes
